# <a name="add-a-birthday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="0ac26-102">Outlook.com で誕生日の予定表を追加する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ac26-102">Add a birthday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0ac26-103">ページの下部にある予定表アイコンを選択し、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ac26-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon.</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="0ac26-104">[[予定表] に移動](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar)します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ac26-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0ac26-105">左側のウィンドウで、[**誕生日**] を右クリックして [**新しい誕生日**] を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ac26-105">In the left pane, right-click **Birthdays** and select **New birthday**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0ac26-106">個人の名前と誕生日を入力して、**[作成]** を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ac26-106">Enter the person's name and birth date, and select **Create**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0ac26-107">**[誕生日]** の予定表を選択して、リマインダーのオン/オフを切り替えます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ac26-107">Select the **Birthday** calendar to toggle reminders on and off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0ac26-108">詳細については、「[誕生日や休日の予定表を追加する](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0ac26-108">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
